attributes.action: Stop dentists closing their books for nhs patients and having to re-register
attributes.additional_details: Low earning people/families need to be able to access dental care as and when they need it.
attributes.background: If an nhs patient doesnt routinely see a dentist they get removed from the surgery and made to re-register, the problem is that dentists are closing their books to nhs patients so we have nowhere to go, if we cannot afford private care

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to de-register patients are a matter for individual dentists, not the UK Government or Parliament.
